method_slots.note: Enabling this will only allow the max number of attacks below to be running with this method.

method_min_time.note: Enabling this will require users to attack for at least the time below.

method_max_time.note: Only enable one of the two options below. ('hard' or 'soft') (Note: You can have both disabled.)

hard.note: Enabling this will allow all users to send for the time below for this method regardless of their account max time.

soft.note: Enabling this will only allow users with the soft max time bypass role to attack over the time set below.

settings.note: Only enable one of the two options below. ('cnc_access_only' or 'api_access_only') (Note: You can have both disabled.)

what_targets_to_allow.note: Enable at least one of the options below. (Note: You can enable them all.)

method_group.note: Enabling 'require_method_group_role' will only allow users with the method group role set in the config.json to attack using this method.

as_number_whitelist.note: Enabling this will override the blacklists that you have set in the config.json file.

restrictions.note: Only enable one of the two options below ('vip' or 'private') (Note: You can have both disabled.)

private.note: Enabling this will only allow the users below to use this method.
